---
title: "Scratch book for coding"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
DY_ICD <- read_excel("DY_ICD10_Classifications.xlsx")

```
pivoting
```{r}

ICD_names <- DY_ICD %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    everything(),
    cols_vary = "slowest",
    names_to = "category",
    values_to = "dx"
  )

```
